$WmMPID_レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Normal,Face|Matthew... After this mission, we're
going to put this life behind us...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_07,0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Play, play, play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pLet's play...explorers!$k$pWe'll drink the nectar of the gods,
so sweet, like sipping a flower!$k$pAnd then we'll be the heroes called
to save the land of dreams!$k$pPlay, play, play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pBut those who drink the nectar will
never...ever...return.$k$pC'mon... Let's play...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
